00019 #ifndef _ALCHEMY_INTERNAL_H
00020 #define _ALCHEMY_INTERNAL_H
00021 
00022 #include "timer.h"
00023 
00024 struct alchemy_namegen {
00025         const char *prefix;
00026         int length;
00027         int serial;
00028 };
00029 
00030 #define DEFINE_SYNC_LOOKUP(__name, __dsctype)                           \
00031 static inline struct alchemy_ ## __name *                               \
00032 get_alchemy_ ## __name(__dsctype *desc,                                 \
00033                        struct syncstate *syns, int *err_r)              \
00034 {                                                                       \
00035         struct alchemy_ ## __name *cb;                                  \
00036                                                                         \
00037         if (bad_pointer(desc)) {                                        \
00038                 *err_r = -EINVAL;                                       \
00039                 return NULL;                                            \
00040         }                                                               \
00041                                                                         \
00042         cb = mainheap_deref(desc->handle, struct alchemy_ ## __name);   \
00043         if (bad_pointer(cb)) {                                          \
00044                 *err_r = -EINVAL;                                       \
00045                 return NULL;                                            \
00046         }                                                               \
00047                                                                         \
00048         if (syncobj_lock(&cb->sobj, syns) ||                            \
00049             cb->magic != __name ## _magic) {                            \
00050                 *err_r = -EINVAL;                                       \
00051                 return NULL;                                            \
00052         }                                                               \
00053                                                                         \
00054         return cb;                                                      \
00055 }                                                                       \
00056                                                                         \
00057 static inline                                                           \
00058 void put_alchemy_ ## __name(struct alchemy_ ## __name *cb,              \
00059                             struct syncstate *syns)                     \
00060 {                                                                       \
00061         syncobj_unlock(&cb->sobj, syns);                                \
00062 }
00063 
00064 #define __DEFINE_LOOKUP(__scope, __name, __dsctype)                     \
00065 __scope struct alchemy_ ## __name *                                     \
00066 find_alchemy_ ## __name(__dsctype *desc, int *err_r)                    \
00067 {                                                                       \
00068         struct alchemy_ ## __name *cb;                                  \
00069                                                                         \
00070         if (bad_pointer(desc)) {                                        \
00071                 *err_r = -EINVAL;                                       \
00072                 return NULL;                                            \
00073         }                                                               \
00074                                                                         \
00075         cb = mainheap_deref(desc->handle, struct alchemy_ ## __name);   \
00076         if (bad_pointer(cb) || cb->magic != __name ## _magic) {         \
00077                 *err_r = -EINVAL;                                       \
00078                 return NULL;                                            \
00079         }                                                               \
00080                                                                         \
00081         return cb;                                                      \
00082 }                                                                       \
00083 
00084 #define DEFINE_LOOKUP_PRIVATE(__name, __dsctype)                        \
00085         __DEFINE_LOOKUP(static inline, __name, __dsctype)
00086 
00087 #define DEFINE_LOOKUP(__name, __dsctype)                                \
00088         __DEFINE_LOOKUP(, __name, __dsctype)
00089 
00090 struct syncluster;
00091 
00092 char *alchemy_build_name(char *buf, const char *name,
00093                          struct alchemy_namegen *ngen);
00094 
00095 int alchemy_bind_object(const char *name, struct syncluster *sc,
00096                         RTIME timeout,
00097                         int offset,
00098                         uintptr_t *handle);

00100 #endif /* !_ALCHEMY_INTERNAL_H */
